entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
